description: Minimalistic blog platform built with Next.js, featuring dynamic routing, markdown support, and server-side rendering for seamless content delivery.
A cross-platform mobile app developed with React Native, offering seamless user experience on both iOS and Android.
A data analysis project utilizing Python and Pandas to derive insights from large datasets, incorporating machine learning models.
An immersive 3D game developed using Unity and C#, featuring advanced graphics and interactive gameplay.
